A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed this movie. I love Star Wars but not obsessed. Movie had a few cheesy lines but not very predictable. Few parts I was completely shocked and yes you don’t get any action till like towards the end but it can’t always be about that you need some of the story! Love the actor/actress of Rey\, Ben\, and Po. Overall a good movie! I would go see it again. I can’t wait for episode IX !
